languages.text: Оправдал{mf||а} Хейнриксу уничтожение еретического когитатора желанием предотвратить новые жертвы.
Told Heinrix that you destroyed the heretical cogitator to prevent more death.
languages.original_text: Оправдал{mf||а} Хейнриксу уничтожение еретического когитатора желанием предотвратить новые жертвы.

traits.locale_text: Told Heinrix that you destroyed the heretical cogitator to prevent more death.
Told Heinrix that you destroyed the heretical cogitator to prevent more death.
Told Heinrix that you destroyed the heretical cogitator to prevent more death.
Told Heinrix that you destroyed the heretical cogitator to prevent more death.
Told Heinrix that you destroyed the heretical cogitator to prevent more death.

languages.text: 你告诉海因里希，说你摧毁了那台异端沉思者，以免更多人失去性命。
languages.original_text: Told Heinrix that you destroyed the heretical cogitator to prevent more death.

traits.locale_text: 你告诉海因里希，说你摧毁了那台异端思考器，以免更多人失去性命。

languages.text: Heinrix gesagt, dass du den ketzerischen Cogitator zerstört hast, um weitere Tote zu verhindern.
languages.original_text: Told Heinrix that you destroyed the heretical cogitator to prevent more death.

traits.locale_text: Heinrix gesagt, dass du den ketzerischen Cogitator zerstört hast, um weitere Tote zu verhindern.

languages.text: Vous avez dit à Heinrix que vous avez détruit le cogitateur hérétique pour l'empêcher de faire d'autres victimes.
languages.original_text: Told Heinrix that you destroyed the heretical cogitator to prevent more death.

traits.locale_text: Vous avez dit à Heinrix que vous avez détruit le cogitateur hérétique pour l'empêcher de faire d'autres victimes.

languages.text: Le has dicho a Heinrix que has destruido el cogitador hereje para evitar que muera más gente.
languages.original_text: Told Heinrix that you destroyed the heretical cogitator to prevent more death.

traits.locale_text: Le has dicho a Heinrix que has destruido el cogitador hereje para evitar que muera más gente.

languages.text: ハインリックスに、これ以上の死を防ぐために異端の考算機を破壊したと伝えた。
languages.original_text: Told Heinrix that you destroyed the heretical cogitator to prevent more death.

traits.locale_text: ハインリックスに、これ以上の死を防ぐために異端の考算機を破壊したと伝えた。

languages.text: Heinrix'e, daha çok insanın ölmesini engellemek adına kâfir kavramsayarı imha ettiğini söyledin.
languages.original_text: Told Heinrix that you destroyed the heretical cogitator to prevent more death.

traits.locale_text: Heinrix'e, daha çok insanın ölmesini engellemek adına kâfir kavramsayarı imha ettiğini söyledin.
